aws:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the AWS DS Resource being acted upon

ds-data:identifier.description: Filters access by the type of identifier provided in the request (i.e. SAM Account Name)

ds-data:membername.description: Filters access by the directory SAM Account Name included in the MemberName input of the request

ds-data:memberrealm.description: Filters access by the directory realm name included in the MemberRealm input of the request

ds-data:realm.description: Filters access by the directory realm name for the request

ds-data:samaccountname.description: Filters access by the directory SAM Account Name included in the SAMAccountName input of the request
